metadata.name: Arthriten Joint Pain Relief 580 mg 1 Tablet film coated

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Magnesium salicylate is a common analgesic and non steroidal anti inflammatory drug NSAID used to treat mild to moderate muscular pain
